attributes.action: Improve the rights of residential tenants to have decent accomodation until new affordable housing is built
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an increasingly two tier property environement, the poor are oftern living in low quality dilapidated rented accomodation. We ask Gordon Brown to improve the rights of tennats to lodge legitimate complaints to landlords for neccesary repairs and to freeze the landlords ability to serve a section 125 notice (eviction procedure under the Landlord and Tenant Act 1927) until the tennants property has been wind and weather tight, and has been free of significant defects for a period of 6 months.
